Save, then add a category reduction.
trans-unit.target: 儲存後新增一個分類折扣

trans-unit.source: The "indexed" products have been analyzed by PrestaShop and will appear in the results of a front office search.
trans-unit.target: "被索引" 的產品已經透過 PrestaShop 分析，會在前台搜尋中出現。

trans-unit.source: Building the product index may take a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: 建立產品索引會花上幾分鐘

trans-unit.source: Add missing products to the index
If your server stops before the process ends, you can resume the indexing by clicking "%add_missing_products_label%".
trans-unit.target: 若伺服器在完成前就停止，您可以點擊"%add_missing_products_label%"來繼續。

trans-unit.source: You can set a cron job that will rebuild your index using the following URL:
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定系統排程執行下面網址來重建您的索引：
搜尋最後幾個字完全相同

trans-unit.source: Maximum approximate words allowed by fuzzy search
trans-unit.target: 模糊搜索允許的最大近似詞
文字長度上限 (字元數量)
文字長度下限 (字元數量)

trans-unit.source: The "weight" represents its importance and relevance for the ranking of the products when completing a new search.
trans-unit.target: "權重" 代表著建立新搜尋時產品的重要性與相關性

trans-unit.source: A word with a weight of eight will have four times more value than a word with a weight of two.
trans-unit.target: 文字權重 8 會比文字權重 2 要多 4 倍的數值

trans-unit.source: We advise you to set a greater weight for words which appear in the name or reference of a product. This will allow the search results to be as precise and relevant as possible.
trans-unit.target: 建議您在商品名稱或編號使用比較大的文字權重，這會讓搜尋結果更加精確

trans-unit.source: Setting a weight to 0 will exclude that field from search index. Re-build of the entire index is required when changing to or from 0
trans-unit.target: 設定權重為 0 將會從搜尋索引中排除該欄位。當更改為 0 或是由 0 開始時，需重建整個索引。

trans-unit.source: It will only be applied to the multistore header to highlight your shop context.
trans-unit.target: 它只會應用於多店標題以突出您的商店背景。

trans-unit.source: It will only be applied to this group of shops, each store will keep its individual color.
trans-unit.target: 它只會應用於這組商店，每個商店都會保留自己的顏色。

trans-unit.source: Store name (e.g. City Center Mall Store).
trans-unit.target: 商店名稱（例如 Xx商城）。

trans-unit.source: Displayed in emails and page titles.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在頁面標題和電子郵件中

trans-unit.source: No redirection (you may have duplicate content issues)
trans-unit.target: 不轉跳（你可能有重複內容的問題）

trans-unit.source: 302 Moved Temporarily (recommended while setting up your store)
trans-unit.target: HTTP 302 暫時移動 (建議在設定您的商店時使用)

trans-unit.source: 301 Moved Permanently (recommended once you have gone live)
trans-unit.target: HTTP 301 永久移動 (建議在當您確定上線後使用)

Round down towards zero, when it is half way there

trans-unit.source: Hide this status in all customer orders.

trans-unit.source: Display available quantities on the product page
trans-unit.target: 在產品頁上顯示可用數量
在列表中使用商品屬性組合圖像

trans-unit.source: This option allows you to choose which image to display in listings for products with combinations. By default, the cover image of the product will be used. If you enable this option and your filtering module is properly passing the required information, then the default image of the combination found will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此選項允許您選擇在具有組合的商品列表中顯示哪個圖片。默認情況下，將使用商品的封面圖片。如果您啟用此選項並且篩選模塊正確傳遞所需信息，則將顯示找到的組合的默認圖片。

trans-unit.source: Edit information about your pages to gain visibility and therefore reach more visitors. We advise you to start with the index page, it stands for your homepage.
trans-unit.target: 修改有關您網頁的信息，以獲得可見度並吸引更多訪問者。 我們建議您從索引頁面開始，因為它代表您的主頁。
